backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing posts in a map with create, fetch (single/all), and delete operations using traps for missing or duplicate entries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and tests with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend components, hooks, styles, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining a neutral OKLCH variable palette for light and dark modes plus global background and text bindings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root element and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up QueryClient and theme handling, then rendering site layout and PostFeed within a branded header.
frontend/src/components/PostFeed.tsx: Component fetching and rendering posts with loading, error, empty states, and styled Card-based post display.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper adding a footer with brand copyright, attribution, and a separator.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook creating and caching an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidating dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing DFINITY Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hook fetching posts from the backend actor via getPosts.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining warm earthâ€‘tone color variables, typography, and light/dark mode adjustments for the blog theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point rendering App inside InternetIdentityProvider and QueryClientProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color system, extended theme settings, animations, and typography/container/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current project state for the 'Gao Fitness Experience' blog, including features, new requests, and architectural notes for frontend and backend work.
